So I've noticed in other text adventure creators there's a panel for actions rather than a command bar. I was wondering if there was a way to create and manage the same thing in quest? I did see Pixie's thing about the New UI Button Panel, but unfortunately I don't really understand how that's supposed to work. Basically what I want is a panel I can alter with each new room (like the Objects panel) but instead of clicking on an Object to show the available verbs have the click automatically trigger a single verb.

Example:

You are in a room, there's a bucket on the floor. 

(Then have a panel on the side labelled "Actions" that reads)
Examine the Bucket
Kick the Bucket
Leave the room

If you click "Examine the Bucket" it'll print "It's a bucket what do you want?"
Click Kick the Bucket, Print "You knock it over you horrible person."
Click Leave the room and you leave the room.

No extra clicks.  Then the next room will have new actions to click on.
